content.detailedDescription:
I'm from brazil and this week i saw something unusual, ace 5 am an object in the middle of nowhere next to the highway, he had made a hexagon sides, had an open door with a very strong light onte cleared bush all around, never seen so closely, here always appears objects and wanted someone review research, is not the first ez it happens at the end of last year saw a plane being followed by a 4 times larger object and was white with a red port in the middle, in 1986 saw two objects resting on a mountain, in less than three minutes these objects rose to the skies.
if you want more details i can draw up to the lords have an idea of what is, grateful for the attention.

i know that something happens here, i am curious to find out since 1986, do not have time and resources to do this study and ask for help, work and take care of my parents who do not walk good health.
i do not speak your language
content.summary: One cylindrical object full of dark sides with a door with bright light coming to clear all set.

content.detailedDescription:
I was an ensign usnr watch officer in danang at the white elephant office building during the war. the ufos appeared at some of the boat ramps along the danang river.  i received many reports from these locations and an official report was submitted to the commanding office of the naval support activity in the morning after the event.  no response was received after the event.  i kept a copy but since i recently moved to fl.  it may have survived.  
another event occurred in arlington, va. in march of 1993.  i had just built a 6inch reflector telescope and was looking at the moon about 9 pm.  i observed many flying objects crossing the moon.  ,the shape was similar to long black paper triangles arranged in a circle.  they were not geese, no flapping wings, airplanes, etc.  the direction was north to south across the lower limb of the moon.  the images were very sharp.  the speed was moderately fast.   i would say the diameter of the object was the width of the moon. 



















jects was the
content.summary: Warzone in da nang, rv

content.detailedDescription:
1) it was during a night mission and i was with my convoy of us army hmmwv(s) waiting to receive the go-ahead to start back to our fob. 

2)it was dark and we were waiting for orders.  i happened to look up in the night sky and saw these lights appear.  

3)  at first i was baffled.  i figured it could be anti-aircraft flares but to my knowledge we didn't have any aircraft covering our movements.  i was familiar w the phoenix lights case and realized that what i was seeing strongly resembled what i had seen on tv about the phoenix case.  

4) one after the other, these lights appeared in sequence and progressed like an inchworm across the sky in a straight line.  i thought it must be flares but from what i could tell none of them descended towards the ground.  they were bright like car headlights and just hung there for a about a minute until, one after the other sequentially they disappeared.  it lasted for about 5-10 minutes.  no sound as it progressed which made me wonder bc i think we would have heard an aircraft at that range. it wasn't close but wasn't too far away either.

5) my first reaction was to draw the attention of a few others to it but they didnt think it was a big deal because we were on a mission and needed to focus.  it made me wish i had a camera on me but i didn't. 
i tried asking some of my old army buddies if they remembered the event years later but no one seemed too recall.  :( 

6) eventually it inched it's way across the sky, parallel to our position until it was out of sight.
content.summary: I witnessed a ufo while on 2004 iraq deployment that greatly resembled the phoenix lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was talking with my uncle and old friend holly in my livingroom. i was sitting on the futon facing the window and holly was facing me. my uncle was playing xbox so he hadn't been paying attention. out of the corner of my eye i saw a bright object outside so i turned my head a bit to look and when i did i saw this huge, bright blue ball of light shoot across the center of the sky from north to south. it lasted about six seconds. i know it wasn't a plane or anything like that because of how big it was in comparison to stars and airplanes that i'd ever seen in the area, and we've had planes that fly pretty low. there was no blinking, no sound, nothing but this solid sphere. it left no trails of any kind as it traveled and as it got about a mile away in ground distance, it simply disappeared as if it just turned off. i'm not sure what it was but i've searched online for any reports of meteors or anything like that to debunk what i saw but i haven't found anything but other sightings of odd lights in neighboring states.
content.summary: Big, bright blue ball of light shot across center of sky in about 6 seconds and disappeared with no trails whatsoever

content.detailedDescription: I was flying a kite with my kids on 4-11-2015. i decided roll take a photo of the kite, when i went back and looked at the picture i noticed a blue sphere shaped object in the sky to the right of the kite. i do live by a local airport; in bethalto, illinois.  after i noticed the object in the photo i attempted to zoom in on it. once i did that i noticed that there where 6 whitish/silver objects or possibly lights within the blue sphere. i did not notice the object at the time the photograph was taken, and i don't recall hearing any sounds or seeing any movement. i served in the united states army and i have never seen anything that even remotely comes close to what is in the photo, therefore i would have to say that the object in question would more than likely be an unidentified flying object.
content.summary: My kids were flying kites. i took a picture of the kite, after reviewing the picture i noticed a blue sphere to the right of the kite

content.detailedDescription: I often go to bed early hours of the morning so that night  i was washing up after dinner and something made me look up i saw what looked like about 9 to 12 bright orange spheres flying from the southeast over to the southwest these spheres grouped together in a sought of formation then at extremely high speed 1 by 1 shot off into the distance this left me feeling rather shaken i woke my wife up and told her what i had seen since then i have seen single spheres appear at random these spheres are sometimes neon red or green
content.summary: Multiple sightings of different colored lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to the grocery store approximately 10:15 in the evening when i noticed a solid red light that appeared stationary in the sky. as a traveled down the road closer, i noticed another white light seemingly appear from nowhere. the white light blinked at the red light a few times and then both lights started to travel west while still maintaining their exact distance. suddenly the lights just disappeared. now, i lived for over 13 years in the flight path is detroits metro airport and i've seen hundreds of planes. these were not like anything i have ever seen before. i won't say that the lights were ufo's but, i can tell you with 100% certainty that these lights were no aircraft that i've ever seen. i was very curious but confused as to what these lights were.
content.summary: Solid red light hovering in the sky. then moving west it was followed approximately 500 ft by a white object.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my walk north bound on norris. the size and color of the object made me notice peripherally. i have seen 3 ufos like this over this area in the last 4 years and i reported one to mufon. i do not think the investigator believed me. i got good pictures this time which are included. it was a red-orange boomerang that was traveling nw and changed into a ball. i have seen another boomerang same color same direction this is the one i reported to mufon (march 2010) and i saw two orbs that were red-orange on another occasion. this is the only one that changed shape. i also have video that is not as good as pics. i used to get chills and get a bit unearned. i don't scare easily, i just wanted a picture to prove it. the object faded into horizon and treetops, cloudy night which illuminated the object better.
content.summary: Boomerang ufo red-orange then changed to a ball

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were on our fifth floor balcony.  1030 pm april 12 2015
chevron shape.  size of a football field.  several large lights up and down the chevron.  many smaller lights less bright.  moving many times the speed of a jet and several times the size.
content.summary: Flying v shaped lights travelling very fast

content.detailedDescription: Hello my name is keith i want to tell you about what happened to me and my 2 brothers and my mom and dad..When i was 12 my mom and dad used to take my brothers and i out driving in the country my dad used to tell us ghost stories and visit old farm houses.We loved it but we were also scared..But one night when we were driving down the road,up ahead the road was up hill about a 1/4 mile.There was a bright light it looked like a star but 100 times closer my dad,stopped the car asked us what we thought this light was,my brother don said it was a farmer on his tractor and it was the spotlight on the tractor.But my dad said i don't think so,i said it was the headlights reflecting off a sign. and then my dad turned off the headlights.And it did not change my dad said lets just see what the hell that is,and he turned on the headlights,and started up the hill. remember were about 5 miles from our farm...And the only thing we remember is coming to our driveway and so happy to see our house and being so sleepy,and nune of us spoke...And no knowledge of what the light was.....And this has been hounting me so much ...I have lost my dad and mom and older brother...To cancer...There is me and my younger brother that is left but he changes what he remembers..Can you give me help to know....
content.summary: Do not remember time or event, i was just a kid

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of sunset in back yard. it got dark and i noticed a   larger then normal bright star like object. it had a bright flashing   light and it changed directions and shapes.I took photos with my 35mm digital camara.Ifeel like i saw something totally unexplainable. i lost sight of it when it decended and changed direction in the night sky. my camera is fully charged and when go to take the picture it snaps slowly like my battery is low. its like its got some kind of energy about it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looks like a really large and  bright  star . it  flashs and moves up and down and changes directions.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Observed a star-like light moving across the sky above tarpon springs, fl on 4/11/15 in a south east to north north west direction. the whole event took about 5-6 minutes and ended at 21:15.  

i was sitting on my front porch looking at the sky because it was such a nice, clear night.  i thought it was a falling star or meteor at first, moving across the sky, because it was so high up but it had a slower, steadier pace as opposed to streaking across the sky.  there were no other visible lights on it.  it made no sound.  i made my husband come outside and look at it because i thought it looked strange.  we watched it move behind a small patch of cloud cover that was blowing through and then it turned around.

 it went back almost the exact way it came.  it then crossed the entire view of horizon available to me in about 3 minutes, so it had to of been extremely fast.  just before it disappeared from my view, i saw a very small streak of light.  i then checked my phone to get the exact time.
content.summary: Observed star-like object move across the sky, then turn around and eventually disappear after a short burst of light

content.detailedDescription: See video
content.summary: Orb flying unlike any drone, lights that did not brighten dark areas

content.detailedDescription: See video
content.summary: Orb flying unlike any drone, lights that did not brighten dark areas

content.detailedDescription: From my father who eye witnessed this spinning top like ufo while watching a baseball game in cote st luc, montreal, quebec.  from my father, "just sitting in the park early in the summer with my son who was approximately 10 years old ", my father is now 90, and i have heard this since i can remember.  heard the story again today and i have to report it, would like to get it really investigated.  "the object came in from one side, it was shaped like a spinning top and spun in a whorling type manner. no sounds, but my son said, "what is that", i could not say anything, and did not have an answer."  both my brother and father talk about this event like it happened yesterday, the event is over 50 years ago.
content.summary: While in park with son, who also witnessed, top like item flew across sky

content.detailedDescription: I was lying in bed & observed a vertical illuminated rod type craft out my bedroom window
content.summary: It was a vertical lighted rod

content.detailedDescription: It was regular saturday evening.  i was just walk around n saw a flying object which not regular flying objest something i never seen early. it's emmit yellow or dark yellow light like regular bulb, moving very fast n changes it directions. it was visible for more than 30 mins.
content.summary: It was moving very fast changes its direction in regular interval.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been skeptical to report what happened many years ago. but with soo many people coming forward i want to come forward with my experience too:
i remember being in middle school (about 15 years ago), writing my book report at night in the living room. when all of a sudden the lights in the living room flickered on/off and then a bright white light illuminated our whole living room as though it was day time. so we went outside to investigate what had caused this. we saw something that we will never forget. my brother went outside first, followed by my mom and as i was slowly walking towards them i remember the look on my brother and moms face as they looked up at the sky (awe and fear). when i went outside and looked up at what they were looking it, i saw a ufo, it was round and had different lights around it (red and green from what i remember). but that moment i saw it i froze and in a matter of seconds it zig zagged and disappeared into the night. when it was gone, we were speechless. did we really just see what we think we saw?  my block is usually always busy with people and kids riding their bikes. the weird thing is that for once, our block was completely quiet. no one around. i don’t know if anyone else saw this. it seemed like we were the only ones who had seen this. i forgot to mention that my little two year old nephew was left inside the house while we quickly went outside to investigate, and when we came back inside the house; my nephew was making weird sounds and gestures. we had no idea what he was trying to let us know. but it seemed as though he might have seen something. i remember sleeping in my parents room that whole week and then with the light on from that point on until i moved in with my boyfriend.
content.summary: Lights flickered on/off and a bright white light illuminated our whole living room, we went outside to investigate and saw a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
This is not a ufo sighting..But some strange occurance i witnessed recently.
i am a 60 year old normal guy..I don`t drink or take drugs,i am very fit(cycling)for my age.

i was just leaving my kitchen when i felt i had a sense of being observed or scanned..?I naturally,quickly turned my head and i saw the most weird creature i have ever seen.It was only about 1.5",very small..My first instinct was to stamp on it with my shoe,which i tried to do.I didn`t hesitate,i quickly tried to stamp on it,thinking it was some creature out my garden.(i didn`t think of it as being unusual in this instant..Until),at the exact same time or a millisec before i lifted my shoe,the creature new what i was going to do,it excellerated forward and ran under my freezer which i keep in a cupboard,it`s excelleration wasn`t normal,it started slow but its speed of excelleration was smoothe like it 
was linear or increased expodentially,it travelled a few feet until it got under cover.This is also very weird..I got a good look at it,its bottom half was black or dark blue and its equally sized top half was pink,like flesh.(looked like it was wearing trousers),it bent in the middle with the pink half up right,it had four legs on the dark half with feet like hooves shape and four arms on the pink half with similar shaped hands..No noise,just left me speechless.
it`s played on my mind since then wondering what i had seen.
if anyone has seen anything similar,or know what it was,i would like to know.
i find it very strange indeed.
content.summary: My strange encounter with an unknown creature.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside my apartment building to smoke a cigarette. as normal because of my facination and love of the universe, i walked out the door and observed the entire sky from the east to west horizons. i usually look for any recognizable constellations. at this time orions belt was about two hours or less from the west horizon. i was outside approximately fifteen minutes in which i first initionally see at blink or flash from my periphial(often how i notice them. so i studied torward the direction of southwest, which from where im located is in the direction of stukel mountain in oregon and lava beds national mounument in california. i seen a star like object in the sky at about a 40-60 degree angle. and in was hovering. i was flashing the same similar colors as i had seen the night before. yes, this is my first report of a similar object i had seen in the sky in two different nights. *first citing: 04/11/15 approx. 6:30p.M. or 7:30pm **second citing on 04/12/15 approx. 2:05a.M.
i was watching this star like object flashing its blinks lights from the sky as it started to ascend up but from my angle it woulda look as if it was going up, may, have been just been coming north.The only problem is that it didnt go in a straight line. it kinda moved in a chiralmotion (swirling or helix direction). (chiralmotion is a scrolling term, that to me, best decribes wat i mean).It also seemed to have characteristics, when i would focus my attention to it, it would act as if to hide behide the tree that was also in the direction of the object.It did that for about five minutes. finally, i said the lords prayer and ask for protection as well as understanding. that if they are not of the lord, and are  different(beings), then i want nothing to do with them. as i was watching this object,it had flashed at me while i was looking in its direction i  had two things going on physically. first i kept getting this prickely feeling all over like tingely. hairs on neck stood up and a shiver. but like a natural sensation.I also have an intense and constant buzzing or vibrational feeling going through me for the last week. i feel the ground move all the time but this is intense. a lot stronge. and people that come around me, constantlt start to feel uneasy, or even comment how chaotic and strange the atmosphere has been intensifying rapidally locally. i kept talking torward the object and stating if it had bad intentions to leave me alone. i never lost sight of it, i simply stated what i needed to and finally broke free internally and went back inside. it was still in the sky when i went in.  
in the first citing, the day before i had seen a simialar object in the sky closer to county airport/air force or national guard base.That object lasted ten minutes in the sky and disappeared. i had the same vibrational feeling. intensely.
content.summary: Spot a blinking or bright starlike light very high in sw direction torward the radio tower stukel mountain, or and torward lava beds national monument, ca

content.detailedDescription: I was at my grandma's house in santa rosa, ca. it was getting late, "around 12pm at night or so" and i was watching tv. i decided to go to bed so i walked back to my room. i turned on the lights and walked to the window to close the blinds. this is when i observed a flying orb like object. it was flying casually above houses just out side the court. i didn't know what to make of this of course and i rubbed my eyes and cheked to see if it was just a reflection in the window or some sort of helicopter. none of that appeared to be so. it was then i realized this was very real whatever it was. it was maybe a minute or less before the orb flew closer to my house maybe within 50ft. it must have seen me because a beam or light focused on my window and then fear set in immediately. the lights turned off in the room and an old radio from the 60s turned on at almost full volume. at this point i was beyond scared and wanted to run. i was yelling to myself in my mind to run but couldn't move. something in me finally snapped and i took off running to the living room. i was shaking and hiding under a table for a very long time... by the time i got the courage to look out a window again the orb was gone. my room was back to normal when i went back... this happened around when i was 12 to 14. this was a very real experience to me that had been unexplained ever since... was this orb man made? was this an alient craft? why did the lights turn out and radio turn on? was it a threatening event? or just a curious ufo?  i have forever remembered this experience. i'm curious if anyone has experienced something similar.
content.summary: Orb of light flying casually. observed me though a beam or light.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on the beach with my girlfriend and dogs when we decided to turn and walk to the north back to where our car was parked. when we turned, we noticed a dark object darling the sky where the sun had went down 15 minutes before and thought it was maybe a really dark cloud, so i took my flashlight out, turned it on, and flashed it in a up and down motion 3x's and it just disappeared. needless to say, we left quickly and am still dumbfounded. had our second really big sighting just a week after that.
content.summary: Ufo darked out lit atmosphere and disappeared after flashing flashlight 3x's @ it.

content.detailedDescription:
Approx 9:45 took dogs to the back yard. noticed an extremely bright light about 25 deg up from horizon over neighbors house that speared to slightly bob up and down. brought dogs in and grabbed my binoculars. went out front and the light had dropped to about 20 deg and through the binoculars appeared to be eight lights surrounding a central light. the lights moved as a disk that was slowly tumbling and rotating. it took 3 to 5 seconds to go from edge on to full circle. this entire time it was moving down and to the northwest. called my wife out look who observed the same tumbling motion and was frankly freaked out by what we were seeing. 

low thin clouds were moving in from the north, dimming the object so we went inside, checked the time on the television and it was 9:49.

went back out at 10:01 according to the tv and the light was no longer in view. searched the sky and noticed a plane with dual landing lights and navigation lights blinking to the north and what appeared to be a high altitude plane north-northeast by the navigation lights through the binoculars.

during the observation a neighbor was checking his mail and we chatted about how bright the light was. brighter than the street lights on our street.

multiple checks up to about 11:30 there were no other observations of unusual lights.

elevation readings are approximate and taken later with a compass, ruler and level to get the reading of where the light was seen using the neighbors house and power lines as reference.

did not attempt to photograph because the multiple lights were not discernible by naked eye. do not have a camera with zoom lens.
content.summary: Disk of 8 lights, 1 in center rotating and tumbling while moving from west to northwest from viewpoint

content.detailedDescription: Ok i lived in elliot lake for half my life and iv seen these lights many times over the years but this time i got daring i had a 2 million amp big flash light i watched them for about 2 hours enter the lake and flash then shoot out into out space well i know y see elliot lake was a mining town take a wild guess what they mined lol, ...... uranneum and it all under the lakes and thats what there where doing gathering it for power well when i flashed them it all turned bad real quick the person i was will ran i didnt wish i did tho now i lost all what happend up too them coming at me and waking up on the beach sore and not sure where i was and they messed up my truck left me standed in the middle of the bush it was a suv a pathfinder and i used a atv trail to get to are campping spot ok so 30 days later i went back to see family and as i came into elliot lake i was saw them again right at 3am at the first turn off on hwy 108 hovering right over the street lights but high way ones so 80ft or so iv bin having night mares waking up at 3>33am every night sins then i stay awake to pervet it y its 2am and im up now its bin years and still happens if u guys wont to see them i can show u them there every night getting that uranium they need it to power there ships anyways ya they r real and i cnat prove it cuz i cant pick them up on video tryed many time like they r not there but iv bin with 10 people and they all see them the people of elloit lake dont wont anyone to know this as  i lived there fir half my life i now live in niagra falls canada
content.summary: I was camping in the bush on a beach and at around 1>33am me the person i was with seen many lights and i know y

content.detailedDescription: I was trying to capture the beautiful sunset over this hill at an undisclosed location in this area. i noticed the object while looking at the pic days later. there are other pics before and after the object within secs of each other and the object is present only on this one and a minor shadow in another one of the pics before.I was surprised to find this sphere in the picture.
content.summary: Sphere traveling n-s that disappeared behind the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
On october 18th at about 10:30 pm while sitting on a balcony facing north i saw a large silent mostly transparent craft fly directly overhead. it had three visible circles, one on each point of the triangle, the edges rippled a little so you could just make out the edges of the craft but the rest of it appeared transparent. 

this was followed by a black helicopter that had a light and made noise. it returned on exactly the same path, north to south about 20 minutes later, but without a helicopter following.

at first i thought it was a ufo but after seeing a mufon program hanger 1 i realized it was exactly the same as they showed and it is one of ours. it appeared to be about 30 feet across and flew relatively low - appearing the size of a softball in the sky relative to my position. it flew perfectly straight at a low altitude without any noise. 

i should have know it was one of ours because the cloaking was not perfect. the edges of the triangle rippled showing its shape and there were three large round lights slightly glowing - one on each end of the three points.

i was very surprised it came back about 20 minutes later on the exact same trajectory, but without a helicopter following it.
content.summary: Oct 18 2014 while sitting on a balcony facing north a large triangular mostly transparent silent craft flew directly overhead in a strait line followed by a black helicopter which made noise. it repeated this 20 - 30 minutes later without the chopper.

content.detailedDescription: I first saw the craft while i was out in my backyard with the dog, i saw odd blinking lights. i then went out front with my daughter. one red one in the front of the craft and three white in the back of the craft. the red one blinked and then the two white ones on the back corner, then the red one, the the white one in the middle of the back. then the two corner ones went out completely and only the red and the middle white remained alternately blinking. there was also a black aura around the craft.
content.summary: Triangle with aura, blinking red and white lights.

content.detailedDescription: The vide will show you everything i witnessed!
content.summary: 8:50pm april 11 2015 on my way to the store i saw a large pulsating orb in the sky. i pulled my vehicle over and began recordin. i have no clue what this is so maybe it's been seen by others tonight? here is my video. thank you

content.detailedDescription:
Location: us 278 in lee co mississippi, over town creek right before you turn off onto hwy 145 to go to nettleton, mississippi.

date: saturday in august of 2012 around i think august 4th.

my parents and i were traveling back from tupelo mississippi on us 278 toward nettleton, mississippi before lunch. right before you turn left to go on hwy 145 to nettleton, there are fields and a creek called town creek. i was watching this very small rain cloud and noticed a rainbow on the left side of the road. in the rainbow i could see an object flying and then it zoomed over the road to the right hand side over the field to a cloud. i took out my non smart phone and took a few pictures of it floating in the cloud. i did not know that i got it on camera until i uploaded the picture. 

my parents just kept driving. 



do you believe in abductions?
content.summary: Was flying around a rainbow then went over the highway to a cloud.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work and it was like 2 am. i lived in a rural area of southern nh and was about to turn onto a side road when i noticed 3 large bright lights above me there were no other cars on the road so i stopped and looked more closely and saw a massive black triangle shape with lights on the 3 corners and it was silent and just hovering about @ 500 feet at most,it was the size of an aircraft carrier just hanging there over the trees. i was in disbelief..I turned on my radio and all i got was static then the car died i tried to restart it and all i got was the typical dead battery clicks when it was just fine a few minutes before,i popped the hood and got out of the car looking up and the lights started to strobe so fast it was disorientating. i leaned against my car to brace myself and whatever it was took off in a split second and was gone that quick...No sound of engines revving up, no nothing it was here and then gone in a blink of an eye, when i regained composure i got back in the car and it turned right over and the radio was fine like nothing ever happened...To this day i am completely freaked out
content.summary: Hovering over the tree tops,huge triangle craft with lights in each corner no sound and then it took off in an instant,it was gone in 1 second
